Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Texas in 1988...
Traded from Texas to New York (N) on 2/1/1989 (Going to NYM: LF E. Sprague Jr., P C. Nagy, P G. Hoffman. Going to TEX: P T. Boggs, 1B G. Biagini, DH A. Dawson, P G. Nelson)...
Earned first career win on 4/26/1992...
Injured on 7/25/1992 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Pittsburgh on 6/23/1993, striking out 4...
Injured on 6/28/1993 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1995, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1995, going 6-0, 1.08...
Injured on 10/4/1996 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1997, going 6-0, 1.53...
